-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: I dream of becoming sales personnel, in business experience GongChengLveDe stimulation.
sentences.chinese: 我梦想成为销售人员，在商场上体会攻城略地的刺激。

sentences.english: The fact that they were Muslim made them more appetizing to conquer, not less.
sentences.chinese: 事实上穆斯林使他们热衷于攻城略地。

sentences.english: It's a “land-grab situation”, says a Chinese executive.
sentences.chinese: 中国的一位经理形容，这就像“攻城略地”。

sentences.english: They will continue to gain ground and, in some cases, overtake us.
sentences.chinese: 他们会继续攻城略地，在某些情况下，取代我们。
